website_summaries.verdict: All-natural foundation is good for the skin and the environment and is easy to apply.
pros: All-natural ingredients like bamboo to help cover skin imperfection
Won't clog pores and is good even for acne-prone skin
Buildable coverage that blends with other makeup
cons: With only 6 color options, some customers had a hard time finding a perfect match

customer_reviews.title: Finally....no talc!!!
customer_reviews.text: What with all the warnings about talc in products, I searched for a pressed powder without it.. I was unable to find anything until I happened upon Burt's Bees, It is talc free and a wonderful powder. I use it on my lips prior to lipstick and it keeps the lipstick on very well. I heartily recommend this all natural product.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sheer and natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is very sheer so it does not cake at all over concealer. I can see people not liking it because it is sheet and very little coverage. It is also not as mattifying as it claim as I see little mica and my nose shine thru in just 2 hours after application. I do have shiny nose so no foundation can really change that. It is great for everyday or casual day. It makes my skin look better without looking like a ton of make up. I also love that it is natural and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Fav powder foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is my third compact of this stuff. It's always sold out in my shade everywhere. I couldnt go longer without it and needed to find it online~! The shade "bamboo" is an olive-neutral undertone and is the most perfect match for my skin that I've found. The foundation itself is soft and natural-looking on the skin. I love it in the summer because it doesn't crease or get greasy-looking. It's a bit dry on my skin type in the winter but I switch up my moisturizer and primer to make it work! I can use a light layer with a fluffy brush for light coverage, or build it up like a true foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Chemical free and non-toxic make up.

I rarely wear make up, but when I do, I feel better using chemical free make up. No toxic chemicals and metals to make me sick (or give me cancer one day).. Color is good. I apply with brush. I can't find Almond shade at stores. Wonder why? Great I can buy on Amazon, but wish the price was lower. $19.99 for one.

If I had the right color, and the foundation hadn't fallen apart the way it did, I would have been very happy with this product.

Burts Bees 100% Natural Mattifying Powder Foundation in Vanilla controls shine with buildable and blendable coverage to give you a smooth and even skin tone. Lightweight and non-comedogenic, Burts Bees Mattifying Powder Foundation is perfect for oily or combination skin, effectively absorbing oil without drying out your skin.
